website_summaries.verdict: An easy-to-operate, hard-to-clean option that is both affordable and useful.
cons: Only two slice varieties: spaghetti and linguini
Some customer concerns about thorough cleaning

customer_reviews.title: Makes good zoods, and buff arms
customer_reviews.text: Works great for what it's supposed to do. Makes good zoods, a little hard to clean, comes with a pipe cleaner to help though. I make my husband make the zoods cause my arm gets tired! Isnt hard but I'd rather not feel like he-man from some darn zoods while I'm cooking. Would I buy again? Eh yes, but I'd rather but a auto zoodle next.
customer_reviews.author: kms1994

customer_reviews.title: you never knew you needed this
customer_reviews.text: This thing is pretty cool. You know how crappy dull vegetable peelers don't work? I admit, I didn't think it would work very well. I made nice looking zucchini noodles right after opening it. The zucchini noodles come out looking like one wide flat ribbon at first, but as soon as you stir lightly, the noodles break apart into strands. I tried it with a carrot though and it did not work because it was too small. You would have to have the world's thickest genetically modified carrot to make it work here. I can't wait to try it with other vegetables but even if it only works with zucchini, I still think it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Gossip Girl

customer_reviews.title: I was a little concerned about using it because a friend of mine bought another brand like this one and she said she not happy w
customer_reviews.text: We used our new Native spring veggie slicer today. I was a little concerned about using it because a friend of mine bought another brand like this one and she said she not happy with it. I was hoping mine would work better and ...it did! the Native Spring slicer is very well designed. I sliced four large zucchini in matter of minutes. It was easy to use, fairly easy to clean (they give you a little brush with helps clean the inside) and I like the overall ease of use. I'd recommend this product to anyone looking to eat a healthy diet. Our zucchini spaghetti turned out fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Broken Blade in Pasta Sauce
customer_reviews.text: After a few uses for spiralizing zucchini noodles one of the tiny triangle blades broke. We only discovered the broken blade when my boyfriend bit into something hard in his pasta dish. We don't trust it enough to use again. Disappointed because I loved using it for zucchini noodles
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome. It gets a little jammed up when I ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. It gets a little jammed up when I try to make a lot of noodles out of vegetables, but overall I am satisfied. My friend has one she got off of here also, and it didn't get jammed up like this so I might ask her where she got hers... maybe I will maybe I won't. I still use this and I really like it. Its just not as easy to clean as my friends was. My veggies get caught in the blades and even the brush doesn't clean it out completely... OVERALL GREAT ...just a few complaints ha! :)
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Hartz

customer_reviews.title: It's Okay
customer_reviews.text: It works well enough. The problem I encountered was I had 4 zucchinis to spiralize. First zucchini was a breeze but after that the blade kept getting clogged from the vegetable. It was frustrating having to stop and clean the blade out every few turns of the zucchini. I ended up only using 3 of the 4 zucchinis because it wasn’t worth the trouble. It does work though, my zoodles came out just fine with a nice texture. Still, I would have spent a few extra dollars for a different brand/model.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Nahigyan

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner Spiralizer
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to get a vegetable spiralizer to make zucchini noodles but since I was not sure how often I used it I did not want to spend a whole lot of money. This was perfect for me. It worked great and has two different "noddle" sizes. There is a reason it comes with a brush, the blades are a little tricky to clean which is why I took one point off. Very portal and can throw in bag when going on picnic or camping so you can make the noodles fresh instead of preparing ahead of time.
customer_reviews.author: Red

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well, but so far with only thicker vegetables like zucchini
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well, but so far with only thicker vegetables like zucchini. I tried carrots and that was impossible to keep straight, just too skinny. Takes a bit of effort to use, but the results were pretty good! Cleaning this was not too bad, but the enclosed brush lost most of it bristles the first time I used it. I am now using a tooth brush.
customer_reviews.author: Mungabella

customer_reviews.title: A very good product made by very nice folks...
customer_reviews.text: A top-notch gadget! Does a great job and the results actually look like pasta. A few minor design chances (in my opinion only!) would make it much more convenient: changing the "pusher" so it stays in the slicer when not in use, and extending it so the is not such a large chunk of left-over stuff. All in all, though, I'm extremely glad I got it, and it's well worth the money. I'd suggest this one to anyone even thinking of buying it....
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: I like the concept
customer_reviews.text: I like the concept. The silver strip that is shown in the photo is sharp. I figured out that if I wrap it in a small towel when using it, I don't cut my hands up when holding it. The first and second time were bloody messes - but then again the kitchen isn't my favorite room. It could very well be operator error and that is why I gave it 4 stars. Again, it is a great way to eat healthy and I will continue to use it, just very cautiously.
customer_reviews.author: Pug Lover

customer_reviews.title: Quick veggie pasta with this simple device
customer_reviews.text: I'm not generally a fan of kitchen gadgets but I love this tool! It's so easy to use, and I get perfect results every time. Their customers service is stellar. The package includes instructions to use consistent pressure and to turn the vegaabke like you would a pencil in a sharpener. I was nervous thinking it was going to be finicky but I was happily surprised. Super easy and consistent results. I love how it fits easily in the drawer and is also easy to clean. It's sharp so keep out of reach of children. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Happi Momma

customer_reviews.title: Although this device does what it is supposed to do ...
customer_reviews.text: Although this device does what it is supposed to do, my problem is with it's construction. As a craftsman the first thing I noticed was the metal structural bands that hold the two funnels. together. The edges are so sharp and dangerous that I had to take metal sandpaper to round the edges before using the product. There is absolutely no excuse for this flaw.
customer_reviews.author: philip n mayo

customer_reviews.title: Easy and healthy!
customer_reviews.text: Wow...what a great little product! It works just like the old pencil sharpeners from elementary school; insert your vegetable and twist. The spirals that are created are just the right size for "pasta" or salads. I made a pile of zucchini spirals and served them with spaghetti sauce; they were delicious and healthy with no "too full" feeling. Cleaned easily (a little brush is included) and stores compactly in a regular sized drawer. Highly recommend and would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Clean Freak

customer_reviews.title: beautiful spiral noodles
customer_reviews.text: Tends to get clogged, I have to stop and unclog it 2-3 times for one zucchini. It also requires a little strength. I can't imagine an older lady or anyone with arthritis or even carpal tunnel using this product. That said, it creates long, beautiful spiral noodles. I don't even cook the zucchini noodles, they are delicious with a little dressing or salsa.
customer_reviews.author: Gorf Denroh

customer_reviews.title: Difficult, wasteful and annoying company
customer_reviews.text: This was very difficult to use and there was a lot of waste at the end. It barely "cut" any out of the center, which is important with zucchini to eliminate some of the seeds and juice. The company kept sending me emails asking me to review this product and at one point even called me! That was very, very annoying. I returned this and bought one of the spiralizers that have a crank. I *love* that product and would never encourage anyone to waste their time or money on this inferior product.
customer_reviews.author: Misty Renee

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Work as Described, Returned
customer_reviews.text: This device is poorly constructed and doesn't work as advertised. A metal tong fell off with the first carrot and after about half way through the vegetable comes to a point and doesn't continue spiraling. The concept is great and I was really excited about it that is why it received 2 stars rather than 1, but very sad that it didn't work out like we hoped. We will try a different and more sturdy set up for this cooking style.
customer_reviews.author: Sean & Jenn

customer_reviews.title: I love this! So easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I love this! So easy to use....didn't need to watch a video to get it right...just follow the instructions. It is not hard to clean this (like so many other people say). Rinse it, poke out the large piece of vegetable that's left (like part of the core) and use the handy brush that comes with it to finish the job. I made zucchini spirals and they were delicious with other veges and chicken sausage. May need to drain the pan after you sauté the zucchini since zucchini's produce a lot of liquid as it cooks before you add a sauce. Can't wait to use it again!
customer_reviews.author: N.D. Philadelphia

customer_reviews.title: The fine art of so-so.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: It takes far less space than a mandolin with a julienne blade. Inexpensive. Cons: It makes a mess and you will always have a cone of the vegetable you're slicing left behind. The blades dull quickly, tipping the scale from slicer to accidental juicer. Not good enough to recommend - not bad enough to return. It may be the perfect stocking stuffier for a foodie. He/she can play with it, re-box it, re-gift it.
customer_reviews.author: David G.

customer_reviews.title: and it did a little better, but still pretty poor performance
customer_reviews.text: Got this as wanted to be able to "noodle-ize" my veggies. On first try, I stuck a carrot in and tried twisting and it just mashed up my carrot. I tried zuchinni, and it did a little better, but still pretty poor performance. I'm returning this for sure - it can barely slice a bean sprout. It's super small, and I found it really hard to clean. Even after just testing it for maybe 30 seconds, I still couldn't get it clean. Hoping the paderno does me better.
customer_reviews.author: A. Brostrom

customer_reviews.title: It Does not Stand Up ocer time
customer_reviews.text: I finally got the attachment for my Kitchen aid Mixer. I also have a peeler that sheds veggie's for a salad.
customer_reviews.author: SusanSKelly

customer_reviews.title: They taste amazing and are way more nutritious
customer_reviews.text: Since receiving our native spring spiral, we have eat so many healthy meals by replacing regular pasta noodles with vegetable noodles. They taste amazing and are way more nutritious. This is easy to use and easy to clean. I can toss it in the dishwasher and done. It has two sides so that you can have thicker or thinner noodles. Great product. I would recommend it to anyone who wants to easily add veggies into their meals.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing but I absolutely hate to clean it. The brush it comes with is great for getting most of the gunk out but a lot of skin will get stuck at the base of the blades. Luckily, the dish washer seems to do the trick and it comes out good as new! It is a little awkward to hold but you get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Duke of Hoagies

customer_reviews.title: Great Slcer
customer_reviews.text: Very good spiralizer, it is simple to use and easy to clean. I was looking for a small slicer instead of a big counter top model, the Native Spring hand held is just perfect for me. Sliced a zucchini for pasta tonight, the slices where long and even, they didn't take long to slice without much effort at all !
customer_reviews.author: Jackk5

customer_reviews.title: Zucchini pasta YUM!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just discovered the "Spiralizer" after borrowing a friend's. There are much more expensive models available but this new piece of equipment for me has changed my dinner menu significantly. My husband and I love pasta but it doesn't necessarily love us. I've made zucchini pasta with this tool and cook the zucchini in spaghetti sauce, add some mozzarella cheese and bake it and YUM!!! Great tool!!
customer_reviews.author: Faith Herzog

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Overall, good quality spiralizer for the price. Noods are a little thinner than other spiralizers produce, but these are fine to work with. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality- hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: I love noodleS! But wanted to cut down on simple carbs. Zucchini noodles are a great alternative! This is an excellent product- very easy to use. Only thing I dislike: HARD to clean!! Even with the little brush they give you things get stuck in the teeth. Other than that, it is wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Bexxa

customer_reviews.title: only works with the most perfectly sized, rock hard ...
customer_reviews.text: only works with the most perfectly sized, rock hard zucchini. Hard to hold in your hand and even cuts you. Would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: J. Zabloski

customer_reviews.title: So far I love it!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I've used my slicer a few times (both on a zucchini) and it worked great. Its the perfect size to create fun dishes out of and it cleans up very easily. So far it seems to be sturdy and something I am sure I will use often. The only thing I wish is that the part you put on the vegetable to safeguard you from hurting yourself should screw on when you aren't using the device - I don't like having to keep track of two pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Good price and nice and compact
customer_reviews.text: For the price of this product I was very pleased. I've seen other more expensive gadgets to make zucchini pasta but I wasn't ready to spend the money and devote the cupboard space to one of them. But this lets me make the same thing for much cheaper and then throw it in my kitchen drawer afterwards since it is so compact. The other brands may work better but I couldn't say because I've never tried them. It also came with a small brush to clean it after using which I was very happy about. Overall I am happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: ted laffoon

customer_reviews.title: i gave this product 5 stars because itmis easy to use
customer_reviews.text: i gave this product 5 stars because itmis easy to use, and should last a long time. Made pasta with zuchinni squash today and it worked excellent. Better yet, the meal was even 100 percent better than using spagetti squash. like real spagetti. We steamed the zuchinni noodles for 20 minutes and then put them in our plates, and added homemade sause. Excellent and without the carbs.
customer_reviews.author: 5  stars

customer_reviews.title: Vegetable Spiralizer (for only some vegetables)
customer_reviews.text: I finally got around to using this a few days ago, and I have to say I'm a bit disappointed. I was excited to use it to make some carrot pasta, but it just wouldn't spiralize my carrot. It just rubbed some of the carrot off in a sort of pulpy mess that just stayed in the spiralizer. I think it was because the carrot was too narrow. I think the spiralizer might work well on thicker vegetables like beets or cucumbers, but I wish it would work on carrots. I think if it is a vegetable spiralizer, it should work on all vegetables. As a side note: The customer service is good.
customer_reviews.author: black olive

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for making veggie dishes
customer_reviews.text: Handy little tool for easily slicing vegetables into a "spaghetti" for lots of healthy and appetizing dishes! Super user friendly and easy to clean, this gadget is a must for anyone, especially those trying to knock out those unhealthy pastas and carbs! Produces similar slicing to a julienne peeler but it's more fun to use and easier to slice up the smaller veggies like carrots. I'm having fun looking for alternative veggies to try besides zucchini and carrots- try radish, zucchini, and carrot for a tri-colored dish packed with nutrients! Also, great price; quality of this product is competitive with the more expensive brands!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great to see if making zoodles is right for you ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this spiralizer because I've been trying to eat healthy, wanted to try spiralizing zoodles and the customer reviews were very positive. This product certainly works, but the noodles that come out are very thin and I was hoping for a "beefier" noodle. Great to see if making zoodles is right for you before, but I think I'm going to have to look for one that makes thicker, more spaghetti sized noodles.
customer_reviews.author: Vikram V. Shende

customer_reviews.title: Its smaller than I realized but it worked better than I thought
customer_reviews.text: This arrived today.... it has two sides, each a different blade size. I tried a cucumber and it was easier than I thought it would be! Cleaning is pretty easy but gotta be super careful. Not sure how durable it is as today is day 1. Otherwise I'm pretty darn happy!
customer_reviews.author: Samuel R Nutt

customer_reviews.title: Not very useful
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my Mom for Mother's Day. It was something she had asked for. She was very disappointed with it. It is not very big, a little bigger than a soda can. It leaves a big cone of the vegetable that you are just supposed to throw away. If you do not you risk cutting yourself very badly!
customer_reviews.author: Ronal D

customer_reviews.title: Product ok, customer service excellent!
customer_reviews.text: While this spiralizer made nice "zoodles", it did waste a few chunks of the zucchini because I could not get the ends to spiralize. The thin metal handles are a bit sharp and cut my fingers up. When I told the company, they got back to me immediately and gave me a full refund and an apology. Excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Close... But No Quite
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to really like this, but I found that the strips are SO thin, that when you cook them they all kinda condense together to the point where it's more mushy string than noodles. Along with that, it is kind of difficult to clean, though I was glad they provided a little cleaner, which I appreciated. The end piece that was supposed to help you leverage the zucchini didn't really work well. Instead of assisting with the twisting, it ended up carving through the end of the zucchini instead. So it ended up making more of the zucchini "unusable" for pasta then I hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Kira Cleveland

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother with this tiny dull slicer
customer_reviews.text: Way too small. It would take forever to make a whole vegetarian meal with this little, dull slicer. I bought a much larger spiralizer locally and am much happier with it. Will send this one back. I would only recommend this if you are cooking for one.
customer_reviews.author: Dona, Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: So cool!
customer_reviews.text: I love this crazy contraption! It slices through veggies like butter! The first thing I made when this beauty arrived at my doorstep was a raw kale pesto served on piles of zucchini "noodles". It looked like something out of a food magazine all because of the spiral slicer. I did some carrots for color as well and was pleasantly surprised with how easy it was. Cleaning the slicer looks difficult but it's super easy since there is a little wire brush included to get into all the teeth and crannies. Overall, love this product, will probably be spiral slicing everything because it's so fun :)
customer_reviews.author: Mooseykins

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome slicer! I made Zucchini Spaghetti last night and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome slicer! I made Zucchini Spaghetti last night and used the slicer for perfect spaghetti size slices, much easier than using a vegetable peeler. Cleaning was easy, but must be careful to use cleaning brush provide because the blade is very sharp which is what you want and need in a slicer. Great price for this handy item. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Had been wanting to try one of these for some time and liked that this one came with a cleaning brush. Easy to use and find that I love using the raw zucchini strings as part of cold salads. Held back on the last star only because you are left with a 'nub' of vegetable since it can't be pushed all the way into the unit when the cap is fitted onto the end of the vegetable and you certainly can't push it all the way in with you fingers without definitely getting cut. Am going to try using it with pieces of sweet potato next time.
customer_reviews.author: Mona

customer_reviews.title: Great compact slicer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little slicer, very easy to use and compact. I tried slicing cucumbers fora Greek salad and it worked just fine. I really like it and would recommend it. However, do be careful and take notice of the caution about sharp and rotating parts. I sliced my finger when trying to clean it!
customer_reviews.author: Nonna

customer_reviews.title: Spend a little more and get a Paderno A4982799
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after hearing about zucchini spaghetti. It does work pretty good however when you get close to the end of the zucchini, you fingers are exposed to very sharp edges. I cut myself in the process of using this for the first time. It works okay but beware of the sharp surfaces. The handle is very uncomfortable as well and ha sharp edges that don't feel comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Nolen

customer_reviews.title: Lower Quality and Not worth of Money
customer_reviews.text: This has very sharp edges (metallic stuff on the side) and is not good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Pradeep

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This was an awful product, very misleading. After trying to use it on 2 separate occasions I threw it out. It did not cut the carrots, it cut my hands. The only time it may work is if you have very thick, large carrots, which are hard to find.
customer_reviews.author: sb

customer_reviews.title: The picture and description are very cute, but in ...
customer_reviews.text: The picture and description are very cute, but in real life it is a bit different. It is difficult to do anything with the item. I do not use it at all. It was a present, and a rather disappointing one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This product met my expectations. I saw it used on a TV cooking show and decided I needed on for my kitchen. Great design and well packaged. Arrived a head of scheduled delivery date. :) This is an item every kitchen should have. I am planning using with the fresh veggies out of my garden. Good value. Excited to try new healthy recipes for my family.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda

customer_reviews.title: Good product but a few cons
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for the price. It is easy to use, but sometimes the blade gets clogged so you may have to clean it out a few times before you finish. The only other con is the last part of the vegetable goes to waste.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this spiralizer
customer_reviews.text: I love this spiralizer! I have used it several times now and it works great, just like a pencil sharpener. The only problem I have had is the last inch or so of the vegetable doesn't get "noodled". I'm working on a way to be able to accomplish that, but in the meantime I just cut it up with a knife and throw it in with the rest.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Schipper

customer_reviews.title: Beware!
customer_reviews.text: I like the zoodles from this spiralizer, BUT the metal handle edges are sharp and left bloody slices all over my hand!! It kind of works without cutting you if you wrap a towel around it while you use it, but you have to be very careful and it's incredibly inconvenient and just not worth it. A little hard to clean, but that might be expected. Would be great if the edges were not so sharp, will probably never use again -- and wouldn't want to give it to anyone for fear of them hurting themselves.
customer_reviews.author: dinolaur

customer_reviews.title: fun utensil
customer_reviews.text: I bought both the Kitchen Active Spiralizer and the Native Spring Spiral Vegetable Slicer, and my daughter and I compared them. Except for the names and different cleaning brushes, they are identical... and probably made in the same factory in China. They worked as advertised and were fun to use. The zucchini and carrots spiralized perfectly and were fun to eat.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie

customer_reviews.title: Ok product, great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: It works ok. Pretty simple and straight forward. Takes some effort and only really works on larger diameter veggies. The customer service of the company is a five star experience however. One of the teeth on my gadget was missing and they sent me out another one and didn't make me return the original.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne M

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little gadget! Highly recommend ordering this, going to grocery store and getting a few zucchinis and some pasta sauce, and going wild. Awesome pasta substitute for those paleo folks.
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: Great for zucchini
customer_reviews.text: I use this only for zucchini. I tried carrots but it was a disaster. However, I love using it for my zucchini and I use it in my pasta instead of noodles... when the zucchini gets to the end - I put a fork in it and then it is easier to turn. The attachment that is supposed to do this - does not work.
customer_reviews.author: lisa peterson

customer_reviews.title: It's not that quick and easy. But it gave me the outcome I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I've only used the vegetable slicer with zucchini so far. And met my expectations with the exception that it's impossible to slice the entire vegetable. The end piece meant to grip the last of the veg didn't do it. This is a hand tool. It's not that quick and easy. But it gave me the outcome I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Lincoln

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to make "spaghetti like noodles" out of various vegetables. I am on a strict low carb diet so this was an awesome addition to my kitchen. I have only used zucchini squash, but it has come out fantastic! I have recommended it to all my friends and a few have them have actually bought it and loved it. The packaging is really small so that was nice and it came very quickly. Easy to store because it really does fit in a drawer like they say it does.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy...
customer_reviews.text: If you look for veggies that fit, this product can work well. Its all about size and what fits. Does a nice job with zuchinni. It gives you those spaghetti strands that I like.
customer_reviews.author: BTD

customer_reviews.title: Loved the zoodles (zucchini noodles)
customer_reviews.text: Loved the zoodles (zucchini noodles)! Product was very easy to use, and very easy to clean with the provided brush. I cleaned it as soon as I finished using it to prevent the zucchini from drying out in/on the blades. The cap did not work as promised to shred the whole vegetable, so there was about an inch of zucchini wasted, but I'm going to try a few different ways and see if I can't make it work better. Overall, I highly recommend this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: lsufan18

customer_reviews.title: it is fun and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Not only does the slicer preform perfectly...it is fun and easy to use. My 11 year old granddaughter just sauteed some zucchini and garlic in olive oil and it was delicious! I also love the size....very compact. Great product. I'm going to order some more for gifts!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dana Guiler

customer_reviews.title: Compact and useful!
customer_reviews.text: This item came in the mail yesterday and I have already made several dishes and snacks with it! It is easy to use, no assembly required and is super small in comparison to other products that do the same thing. I would definitely recommend this to anyone who cooks regularly or eats vegetarian/vega or raw!
customer_reviews.author: jayne van dorsten

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this product. With the first carrot that I used on it the blades jammed up and bulged out of the plastic. The metal pin that goes into the carrot to hold it broke off on the forth carrot. The plastic is not strong enough in my opinion. Maybe its best for light vegetables.
customer_reviews.author: Bws32

customer_reviews.title: Zucchini pasta
customer_reviews.text: Almost perfect- I love using zucchini as a substitute for pasta- in seconds I can have linguine-like strands. I am left with a piece of zucchini about 1-1/2" as unusable- else this would have been a five star review. I am using the spiral slicer instead of a julienne peeler- and the spiral is far better- and significantly less is wasted. If I had a summer garden, I would give this as a gift with zucchini
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Keenan

customer_reviews.title: I don't recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: It sounds simple when you read the instructions. When you actually use it, the slices don't come out the way they are supposed to. There is also a large piece of the vegetable left over even when you use the end piece to avoid cutting yourself. I tossed it in the trash and kept the brush. For the price i didn't see the value in wasting time returning it. I don't recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda Centeno

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not great, doesn't really work well. Cheap, and you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, fairly easy to clean, and it's small so it's easy to store. However, the top part which is suppose to help you twist the veggies down, doesn't really so much besides poke a bunch of holes on the top of your veggie and make a mess. Works best on zuccini, not so well with carrots. I like it for now. Later I will invest in a better one.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: It's a neat little gadget. Not quite what I ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a neat little gadget. Not quite what I thought it would be , but does get the job done. Couldn't use the vegetable gripper as shown in pic, you have to apply too much pressure to the zucchini and it just twists it's self out of the veggie. All said in done I was able to have stranded zucchini with my spaghetti sauce.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Harvey

customer_reviews.title: This thing works just like its supposed to and the instructions are easy
customer_reviews.text: This thing works just like its supposed to and the instructions are easy. For someone as impatient as me, I appreciated that. You put your vegetable in the the end and twist it like a pencil sharpener, and there you have it, Zucchini noodles! They have a little twizzle in there as well to make it easy to clean. I'd recommend this for anyone. Its a great way to start out making veggie noodles. I am sure there are other products out there that are more intricate and make different noodle sizes, but again, I'm impatient and don't care becuase this one works like a charm for me!
customer_reviews.author: sarah buschman

customer_reviews.title: Spiral Veggie slicer
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I expected it to be. It worked great and made perfect cuts. It was very easy to use if you are capable of turning and twisting your hands and wrists. Probably would not recommend it for someone who is elderly and may not have the strength in their hands. Great price, couldn't pass it up.
customer_reviews.author: Terri A. Agy

customer_reviews.title: super easy
customer_reviews.text: This really works and is as easy as it looks. I use mine often and doesn't take up space in cabinet. It is slower than the spiralizer but perfect for one or two people.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: and it works great. i like that there are 2 different sized ...
customer_reviews.text: tried it out as soon as i got it out of the package, and it works great. i like that there are 2 different sized blades. i may not have read the sellers description thoroughly as i expected to be able to use larger vegetables in it. we solved that by paring down the veggies a bit. we like the slicer and am sure we'll use it a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Sitzman

customer_reviews.title: What a great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this gadget! It's so easy to use, and the brush that it comes with makes cleaning it super simple. I can't rave about it enough, I love using it for zucchini, but I'm looking to brank out and try maybe some sweet potato as well!
customer_reviews.author: heather bishop

customer_reviews.title: Worst EVER
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be good to make all kinds of fun veggie spirals, but I was wrong. The box says you can do sweet potatoes, but I cut my fingers trying. I tried to do carrots, that didn't work either. I attempted other veggies and the holder/gripper part just tore through the vegetables. I threw it away. TOTALLY USELESS.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: but once I figured it out it worked great. The only reason I didn't give it 5 ...
customer_reviews.text: it takes a while to get the hang of holding your vegetable and turning the slicer at the same time, but once I figured it out it worked great. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars was it was somewhat difficult to clean even using the enclosed brush.
customer_reviews.author: carol

customer_reviews.title: This is a great little slicer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little slicer! It's compact and cuts all my squash into these lovely long strings. This is way better than pasta. Only suggestion I'd make is making the grips more ergonomic. Perhaps fit a plastic or rubber grip over the metal one to reinforce.
customer_reviews.author: Cornflower

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Great for slicing zucchini and even potatoes. My only complaint is that it's much better at slicing into thick ribbons than thin noodles, but I might just need more practice. Pretty easy to clean too-- especially with the brush that comes with it. I found that the handle for the end of veggies didn't work with my potato (it just tore up the butt of the potato) but it would likely work with harder veggies.
customer_reviews.author: Ko2689

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I don't have space for the larger spiralizer so this is perfect. Easy to clean, and can't beat the price! It does get slightly difficult to manage the end pieces but that's a given since you have to manually turn it. I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Ngo

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Thought this worked great!!! Not difficult to clean and had no problem spiralling a rather large zuke in just a few minutes and all in long strands for pasta. Didn't miss the pasta at all. Plan to use often especially now that summer is close. Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: NJLadyCES

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I love the concept for this, and there are a lot of similar products out there... Go for the similar products. With the juicier veggies, like cucumber, it is so hard to slice! And the seeds get in the way! I'm just underwhelmed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia

customer_reviews.title: An alternative to pasta
customer_reviews.text: I gave up eating pasta a number of years ago and miss it. I happened to stumble upon this slicer, ordered it and couldn't wait for it to arrive. I just love it. The slicer does exactly what it says it will do and was really shocked to be able to make sweet potato 'noodles. I use various kinds of veggies and saute it with my favorite flavored olive oils and so healthy and good to eat. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: SueK

customer_reviews.title: Yummy low carb noodles
customer_reviews.text: I have to eat gluten free and so many recipes substitute spiral cut veggies for traditional noodles. I thought I'd give this one a try. I have loved every dish I have made, the slicer is easy to use and clean. Even though it comes with a little bristle brush I found that using a toothpick in the corners of the blade works the best to get the little bits out. Easy to store and ready to go. I would recommend this spiral slicer to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: oreogirl

customer_reviews.title: Its pretty easy to knick yourself on the blades
customer_reviews.text: It works, kind of a pain to clean. The brush that comes with doesn't really do much. Its pretty easy to knick yourself on the blades. Also was tiring after 3 squash. I'd get the tabletop spiralizer if I had the space to store it...
customer_reviews.author: Kumaraisin

customer_reviews.title: this is useless and barely works - the bigger machine is way ...
customer_reviews.text: this is useless and barely works - the bigger machine is way better and actually gets you what you need. This is just a waste of time, money and whatever you are trying to get noodles out of.
customer_reviews.author: mmig 9

customer_reviews.title: Comes out thin like angel hair pasta
customer_reviews.text: Like it. Comes out as thin as angel hair pasta. wish it could have a thin/thick dial. Then I would have given 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: It didn't make the nice noodles it shows in the pictures for me. Maybe I wasn't doing correctly but I didn't seem to get the results I was looking for. Cheap enough to try though.
customer_reviews.author: Kari S.

customer_reviews.title: The picture shows beautiful long strands of zucchini
customer_reviews.text: I had much higher hopes for this spiralizer. The picture shows beautiful long strands of zucchini. I did not have such luck. I did manage to get some shorter strands of veggies but they broke off. It worked well enough and for the price it was a good starter spiralizer.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Russell

customer_reviews.title: Love this slicer
customer_reviews.text: Love this slicer. Works great on zucchini and yellow squash, does not work on carrots. You can also choose from 2 different size spirals which is nice. The thicker is great to saute and the thinner is great for salads and to eat raw.
customer_reviews.author: A mom who has been there

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: Did not work for me at all. Cut a few shavings out of my zuchini then shaved it all down to one side, then I shaved the other side down, and there was a huge junk of the middle of the zuchini left that I couldn't do anything with. Then I cut myself when trying to clean it. I would not recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Kyle S

customer_reviews.title: Works Awsome!
customer_reviews.text: Just used this for the first time today. Used it for slicing squash and worked just as I thought. Tasted great and texture was just like spaghetti! This will get many uses in my kitchen now that I eat paleo and choose not to eat spaghetti. Cant wait to try it on sweet potatoes!
customer_reviews.author: Renee M

customer_reviews.title: compact, easy to use, affordable
customer_reviews.text: I love that this slicer is compact, easy to use (love the cap that allows you to get down to the last couple inches of your vegetable without risking your finger tips) and produces great jullienned bits and long spirals. The cost is appropriate and the product is perfect for anyone making a few servings a week of vegetable pasta-like spirals...if making enough for a party 20 on a regular basis, you might want a larger, counter-top model, but...really?
customer_reviews.author: Calvert Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great for vegetable pastas!
customer_reviews.text: I was in search of a simple tool that could turn zucchini into veggie pasta. I read a lot of reviews and decided to go with the native spring spiral slicer based on size, simplicity and price. I'm gluten intolerant so this is the perfect tool to make veggie pasta. I've only used it with zucchini so far, but it does what it says it will do! Only cons are that it can be a little slippery trying to turn the zucchini into the spiral tool. Can't wait to try it with other veggies!
customer_reviews.author: Taryn R

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, works well! Sharp blade and easy clean up!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Great kitchen gadget! Easy to use and easy to clean. It shipped quickly, and I was able to try it out the day after I got it. I sliced up some zucchini and it turned out wonderfully. I will definitely order this again if I need a great kitchen gift for someone.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Ann Getty

customer_reviews.title: Native Spring spiral slicer
customer_reviews.text: The first slicer I bought the plastic was broken, so I sent it back a got another one. The metal sides that run the full length of slicer are so sharp I cut myself taking it out of the box. It too is going back, and I recommend no one buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: It got the job done, not well though. ...
customer_reviews.text: It got the job done, not well though. When I was trying to make a cucumber noodle type salad, the "shavings" if the cucumber would get stuck and cloge the blade. It was a bit difficult to clean and I was afraid I would cut myself as a result of the cleaning process. Maybe this product just wasn't for me, but remember to always conside The 3 star reviews. They're very non-bias and speak the truth.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia Tabbara

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I love zucchini noodles! I am a Pre-diabetic so im staying away from the pasta. But this product is awesome, i also use it for carrots. I did not know how to clean it, but I called the owners & they told me what to do. They have excellent customer service. That ol school customer service, that you rarely see now a days!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia V

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! Zucchini pasta is a great way to stay GF and it is delicious. One of my favorite substitutes and ways to make something delicious really healthy. This product makes the pasta super easy and really painless.
customer_reviews.author: Corrin

customer_reviews.title: Nice edition of a product that does as it promises
customer_reviews.text: Nice edition of a product that does as it promises. Not heavy duty, but durable. Easily cleaned. Thank god they include the brush w/the slicer. I'd buy it again, especially, if they make it a little more robust. Can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce H. Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Fun to use!!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this slicer and so much fun to use. I am glad I purchased this slicer.
customer_reviews.author: georgie

customer_reviews.title: This product makes long long beautiful strands. It was perfect for zuchini aglio oilo
customer_reviews.text: Genius! This product will bring you back to you childhood days of sharpening a pencil. If you are looking for low carb "noodles" well get a zuchini and buy this toy! This product makes long long beautiful strands.It was perfect for zuchini aglio oilo! I buy a lot of kitchen gadgets and for the price and ease of use, this one is a "keeper!"
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't be more pleased with this handy little gadget
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be more pleased with this handy little gadget. If you follow the instructions, it works perfectly. It really is like sharpening a pencil, and after a few turns, I was making beautiful Zucchini pasta! It is well made, and as long as you rinse it (and use the included brush) right away, it is easy to clean. Just don't leave the veg's that are stuck in the blade sit there and dry out.....wash it immediately after use. This is a great little gadget, and I will recommend it to my veggie loving friends!
customer_reviews.author: Jan S.

product_meta.title: Native Spring Spiral Vegetable Slicer, Hand Held with Cleaning Brush, Zucchini & Carrot Veggie Pasta Maker
product_meta.description:
Ingenious Way to Add More Healthy, Delicious Vegetables to Your Diet - Quick, Easy and Fun!

Now you can create fresh, delicious, healthy home-cooked meals quickly and easily using this spiral cutter. Turn firm vegetables & fruits into curly julienne strips. Use it with carrots, zucchini, cucumbers, beets, radishes, parsnips, apples and more.

Turn Boring Into Irresistible - Go Beyond Cubes and Flat Slices

Simply use your spiral slicer to create long curly strands of vegetables for healthy low carb meals, stunning salads, interesting stir fries and even fancy garnishes! Even picky vegetable eaters will ask for seconds.

Health-Conscious? This Is For You!

 * Eat more healthy vegetables instead of starches and feel lighter and more energized
 * Eliminating gluten? You won't feel deprived with vegetable pasta
 * Perfect for low carb, paleo and raw food diets
 * Makes prep work a snap
 * You will find yourself craving more vegetables and that's a good thing!

Convenient and Easy to Use

 * Fits perfectly in your hand! Safe to operate with built-in finger guards
 * No machine to assemble; just grab and use
 * Works better than expensive models; sturdy
 * Small enough to fit into your kitchen drawer
 * Dishwasher safe & easy to clean

Buy with confidence with our no-hassle 100% money-back guarantee. With your purchase, you will also receive 2 Bonus downloadable Ebooks (Our Favorite Spiralizer Recipes and Tips to Choosing the Best Vegetables), as well as access to 'how to' videos that show how you can get the most from your Native Spring Spiral Slicer.

Try it now, click the "Add to Cart" button and buy Risk-Free. 100% no-hassle guarantee. Buy several - for yourself and gifts for friends and family - and get free shipping!
feature_bullets: ✅ A vegetable pasta maker that is Ideal for anyone on a raw food, gluten-free, paleo or low-carb diet. If you love pasta but can't eat wheat, this is for you!

✅ Ingenious design. Hand held plastic vegetable cutter with two blade sizes. Use a simple turning motion (just like sharpening a pencil) to instantly turn boring vegetables into irresistible thin curly vegetables treats.
✅ This veggie slicer is easy and safe to operate, no machine to set up. Dishwasher safe & easy to clean, small enough to fit into your kitchen drawer. Unique gift idea for that special cook.

✅ Spiralize endless strips of carrots, zucchini zoodles, cucumber, potato and all kinds of other firm vegetables for low carb, healthy vegetable meals. Perfect spiralizer and vegetable cutter to add more healthy food to every meal.
✅ Two Julienne sizes - 2mm x 3mm and 3.5mm x 5mm. Perfect sizes to create vegetables spaghetti pasta dishes, vegetable stir-fries, salad brighteners and more!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.5 out of 5 stars1,211 ratings3.5 out of 5 stars
